invite.banReason: Banned by {{- bot}} -> Server invites sent on channel {{- channelName}}. Strike 3/3
invite.infraction: $t(constants:errorPrefix) {{- user}}, You can't post invite links here! {{count}}/3

capslock.kickReason: Kicked by {{- bot}} -> Capslock excess on channel {{- channelName}}. Strike 10/10

spam.kickReason: Kicked by {{- bot}} -> SPAM on channel {{- channelName}}. Strike 5/5
